measure.name: Avergae time to process a request
measure.query: SELECT AVG(JSON_EXTRACT(REMARKS,"$.duration")) FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_40' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$'

measure.name: Avergae process time per uri
measure.query: SELECT AVG(REMARKS->"$.duration"), REMARKS->"$.url" FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_40' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' GROUP BY REMARKS->"$.url"

measure.name: Successful Service Requests Ratio
measure.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'MESSAGE_RECEIVED' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'RESPONSE_SENDING' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$'

measure.name: Number of unhandled exceptions
measure.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_ERROR_1' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$'

measure.name: Number of unsuccessfull menu retrievals
measure.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_ERROR_2' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$'

measure.name: Time spent on chat interactions per week (per user)
measure.query: SELECT sum(time),email FROM( SELECT REMARKS->"$.time" as time, REMARKS->"$.email" as email FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_41' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' GROUP BY REMARKS->"$.email", WEEK(time_stamp) ) as T

measure.name: Ratio of chat requests
measure.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'MESSAGE_RECEIVED' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' AND REMARKS->"$.msg" like "Botaction"
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'MESSAGE_RECEIVED' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$'

measure.name: Ratio of community application requests
measure.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'MESSAGE_RECEIVED' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' AND REMARKS->"$.msg" like "Botaction"
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'MESSAGE_RECEIVED' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$'

measure.name: Distribution of requests
Process durations over time
measure.query: SELECT TIME_STAMP AS Time, AVG(JSON_EXTRACT(REMARKS,"$.duration")) FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_40' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' GROUP BY Time

measure.name: Average time to submit a review
measure.query: SELECT avg(REMARKS->"$.time") as time FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_41' AND REMARKS->"$.task" = "review"
